Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
##  hexo

### 

```sh
npm install -g hexo-cli
```

### 

```sh
npm install hexo
```

## 

```sh
hexo init <folder>
cd <folder>
npm install
```

, :

```
.
 _config.yml
 package.json
 scaffolds
 source
|    _drafts
|    _posts
 themes
```

## 

```sh
npx hexo server # npx
```

<!-- more -->

## [hexo-next ](https://github.com/next-theme/hexo-theme-next)

###  1  npm 

```sh
npm install hexo-theme-next
```

###  2  git 

```sh
git clone https://github.com/next-theme/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

### 

`_config.yml`:

```yml
theme: next
```

### [](https://theme-next.js.org/docs/getting-started/configuration)

1. `_config.next.yml`
2. `_config.next.yml`:
   ```sh
   #  npm 
   cp node_modules/hexo-theme-next/_config.yml _config.next.yml
   #  Git 
   cp themes/next/_config.yml _config.next.yml
   ```

### 

: `_config.yml``_config.next.yml`, `hexo clean`, .

```sh
npx hexo clean && npx hexo s
```

##  Local Search 

###  hexo-generator-searchdb

```sh
npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save
```

###  \_config.yml 



```yml
search:
  path: search.xml
  field: post
  format: html
  limit: 10000
```

###  \_config.next.yml 

```yml
local_search:
  enable: true
```

## 

###  hexo-word-counter

```sh
npm install hexo-word-counter --save
```

###  \_config.yml 



```yml
# 
symbols_count_time:
  symbols: true
  time: true
  total_symbols: true
  total_time: true
  exclude_codeblock: false
  wpm: 275
  suffix: "mins."
```

## 

`_config.yml`

```yml
language: zh-CN # zh-CN  themes/next/languages/zh-CN.yml
```

## 

### 

```sh
hexo new page categories
```

`source` `categories/index.md` .

```yml
---
title: categories
date: 2023-09-02 15:36:39
---
```

###  type 

`categories/index.md``date``type`

```yml
---
title: categories
date: 2023-09-02 15:36:39
type: "categories"
---
```

### 

, `categories`

```yml
---
title: Hexo 
date: 2023-09-01 22:09:52
categories:
  - 
---
```

### 

`_config.next.yml`

```yml
menu:
  home: / || fa fa-home
  #about: /about/ || fa fa-user
  # tags: /tags/ || fa fa-tags
  categories: /categories/ || fa fa-th
  archives: /archives/ || fa fa-archive
  #schedule: /schedule/ || fa fa-calendar
  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || fa fa-sitemap
  #commonweal: /404/ || fa fa-heartbeat
```

## 

### 

```sh
hexo new page tags
```

`source` `tags/index.md`

```yml
title: tags
date: 2023-09-02 15:50:52
```

###  type 

`tags/index.md``date``type`

```yml
title: tags
date: 2023-09-02 15:50:52
type: "tags"
```

### 

, `tags`

```yml
---
title: Hexo 
date: 2023-09-01 22:09:52
categories:
  - 
tags:
  - hexo
---
```

### 

`_config.next.yml`

```yml
menu:
  home: / || fa fa-home
  #about: /about/ || fa fa-user
  tags: /tags/ || fa fa-tags
  categories: /categories/ || fa fa-th
  archives: /archives/ || fa fa-archive
  #schedule: /schedule/ || fa fa-calendar
  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || fa fa-sitemap
  #commonweal: /404/ || fa fa-heartbeat
```

## 

### 

```sh
hexo new page about
```

`source``about/index.md`

```yml
---
title: about
date: 2023-09-02 16:04:00
---
```

 index.md .

### 

```yml
menu:
  home: / || fa fa-home
  about: /about/ || fa fa-user
  tags: /tags/ || fa fa-tags
  categories: /categories/ || fa fa-th
  archives: /archives/ || fa fa-archive
  #schedule: /schedule/ || fa fa-calendar
  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || fa fa-sitemap
  #commonweal: /404/ || fa fa-heartbeat
```

## [](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/writing.html)

```sh
hexo new post <title>
```

,  `source/_posts/``<title>.md`, `markdown`.

## 

```sh
hexo server
# 
yarn server
```

`http://localhost:4000/`

## 

```sh
hexo generate
# 
yarn build
```

,  `public`.

## 

. , :

###  `Docker`

```sh
# 1. yum 
yum update
# 2. , yum-utilyum-config-manager, devicemapper
yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2
# 3. yum
yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
# 4. docker, y
yum install -y docker-ce
# 5. docker,
docker -v
# 6. docker
service docker start
```

:

```
  - Status code: 404 for https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/3/x86_64/stable/repodata/repomd.xml (IP: 13.32.50.112)
 'docker-ce-stable'  : Cannot download repomd.xml: Cannot download repodata/repomd.xml: All mirrors were tried
```

[](https://forums.docker.com/t/docker-ce-stable-x86-64-repo-not-available-https-error-404-not-found-https-download-docker-com-linux-centos-7server-x86-64-stable-repodata-repomd-xml/98965/4):
 /etc/yum.repos.d/docker-ce.repo

```sh
vi /etc/yum.repos.d/docker-ce.repo
```

`docker-ce-stable``baseurl`:

```
https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/7/$basearch/stable
```

 `docker` 

```sh
yum install -y docker-ce
```

####  docker 

```sh
systemctl start docker
```

####  docker 

```sh
systemctl enable docker
```

###  `Nginx` 

```sh
docker pull nginx
```

###  `Nginx` , , 

```sh
 docker run -d --name mynginx \
 -p 80:80 \
 --mount type=bind,source=/root/mynginx/conf/nginx.conf,target=/etc/nginx/nginx.conf \
 --mount type=bind,source=/root/mynginx/conf/http-8080.conf,target=/etc/nginx/conf.d/http-8080.conf \
 --mount type=bind,source=/root/mynginx/logs,target=/var/log/nginx/logs \
 --mount type=bind,source=/root/mynginx/html,target=/usr/share/nginx/html \
 nginx
```

###  `Nginx`

###  `Nginx`

```sh
docker restart mynginx
```

Post.title: nodejs+express
Post._content:
> :  nodejs+express+mysql ,, , ,  108 . , : nodejs+express , , . .

## 

<!-- more -->

1. [](https://www.aliyun.com/?spm=5176.10173289.top-nav.dlogo.11322e770VC5ge)
2. , 
3.  ![24843fa87c889f405eabb198257814ec.png](../images/aliyun-server-res/FEB1DEDE-A737-4713-BD84-32AAF99E1220.png)
4. , (Alibaba Clound Linux)![0272c5c5efbe3a713e8fcaa2cab94f02.png](../images/aliyun-server-res/E2863A55-75F7-4242-99C2-3AF7792A0972.png)
5. ![a5ccb723c046ebd83dff22f77aade860.png](../images/aliyun-server-res/1E5521D7-A26F-4767-B79F-8E245EB2DA90.png)

## 

###  FinalShell 

###  node 

```sh
// 1. node
wget https://nodejs.org/dist/v18.17.1/node-v18.17.1-linux-x64.tar.xz
// 2. 
tar xvf node-v18.17.1-linux-x64.tar.xz
// 3. 
ln -s /root/node-v18.17.1-linux-x64/bin/node /usr/local/bin/node
ln -s /root/node-v18.17.1-linux-x64/bin/npm /usr/local/bin/npm
// 4. 
node -v
npm -v
```

### 

1.  `nodejs-express`  zip 
2.  `finalShell` , /home/

###  zip/unzip

```sh
// zip/unzip
yum list | grep zip/unzip
yum install zip
yum install unzip
```

### 

```sh
unzip express-demo.zip
```

###  express 

```sh
// 1.
cd express-demo/
// 2.
node app.js
// 
```

### 

 postman , , , ,  3000 :![d56e19e3c94b7674f48720c4b38c0619.png](../images/aliyun-server-res/948EED37-A2B2-4BB1-9B22-C58B5451604C.png)

 postman , , , , , .

## 

###  MySql

```sh
// 1. mysql
yum install mysql-server
// 2. mysql
service mysqld start
```

###  MySql



```sh
mysql -u root -p
```

 root 

```sh
// 1. mysql
use mysql;
// 2. 
select User, Host from user;
// 3. 
update user set Host='%' where User='root' and Host='localhost' limit 1;
// 4. 
flush privileges;
// 5. 
select User, Host from user;
```

 root 

```sh
alter user 'root'@'%' identified by <password>;
```

### 

 3306 , ![9f72a7a3fb8c419ddfd41efd9014965e.png](../images/aliyun-server-res/37670519-FA8B-4062-BCFE-130FB5F41509.png)

### 

 iterm

```sh
mysql -h <ip> -P 3306 -u root <password>
```

 VSCode , , .


Post.title: ExpressDocker
Post._content:
##  Dockerfile 

 express ,  dockerfile ,  Dockerfile

```sh
touch Dockerfile
```

`Dockerfile`:

```dockerfile
# , dockernodelatest, node:latest
FROM node:latest
# , 
WORKDIR /usr/src/app
# package.json
COPY package*.json ./
# 
RUN npm install
# 
COPY . .
# 3001, EXPOSEdocker
EXPOSE 3001
# 
CMD ["node", "app.js"]
```

## .dockerignore 

`Dockerfile``.dockerignore`, :

```
node_modules
npm-debug.log
```

## 

`Dockerfile`, `Docker`.

```sh
docker build . -t <your username>/node-web-app
```

## 



```sh
docker run -p 3001:3001 -d <your username>/node-web-app
```

> `-d`: 
> `-p`: 



```sh
# id
docker ps
# 
docker logs <container id>
```

##  Nginx 

###  ip

:

```sh
docker inspect <container id> | grep IPAddress
```

:

```json
 "IPAddress": "172.17.0.3",
```

###  nginx .

 `/api/{path}``/{path}`:

```
  location /api/ {
      proxy_pass http://172.17.0.3:3001/;
  }
```

###  nginx

```sh
docker restart <nginx id>
```

---

:

- [ Node.js web  Docker ](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/docs/guides/nodejs-docker-webapp)
